<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shatter Defenses](/Feats.aspx?ID=4806) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 145 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Blackjacket](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=316) (Level 8)

**Requirements**
A frightened creature is in your melee reach

</column>

---

Your offense exploits your enemy’s fear. Make a melee Strike against a frightened creature. If you hit and deal damage, the target becomes off-guard until its frightened condition ends. If the target was already off-guard to you when you damaged it with this Strike, it can’t reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of your next turn.
name: Shatter Defenses
requirement: A frightened creature is in your melee reach
